▶ 1. TRACK: Record your trips on the go

▶ 3. REPORT: Easily submit your tax compliant logbook

 - Do you need to log your car’s odometer? We’ve got you covered. You decide how often you log your odometer and we do all the math between trips. You can set the app to remind you daily, weekly or monthly.

 - We primarily support the following countries: USA (IRS), Canada (CRA), Australia (ATO), United Kingdom (HMRC), Denmark, Sweden, and Finland. But our system is used in more than 50 countries.

Mikä on Vipu-mobiili?

Vipu-mobiili on viljelijän ja hallinnon väliseen tiedonvaihtoon toteutettu sovellus. Sovelluksen avulla voit seurata tukiehtojen toteutumista maatilan kasvulohkoilla ja suunnitella lohkoilla tehtäviä toimenpiteitä. Tilan ensisijaisena viljelijänä voit käyttää sovellusta sen jälkeen, kun olet kirjautunut sisään minkä tahansa pankin tunnuksella tai mobiilivarmenteella.

Mitä toiminnallisuuksia Vipu-mobiilista löytyy vuonna 2022?

- Maksutiedot – Katso yksittäisen vuoden toteutunut maksutilanne maatilalla vuodesta 2017 lähtien. Maksut esitetään summattuna maksupäivittäin valitun vuoden osalta. Sen lisäksi esitetään tukityyppikohtainen erittely maksusisällöstä sisältäen mahdolliset takaisinperinnät ja panttaukset.
- Vastaaminen valvonnan yhteydessä tehtyyn selvityspyyntöön – Tarkastaja voi luoda paikan päällä tehtävän peltovalvonnan yhteydessä selvityspyynnön silloin kun tukiehtojen täyttymisessä todetaan puutteita. Toteuta vaaditut toimenpiteet ja todenna asia sovelluksen avulla sisällyttämällä 1-2 valokuvaa hallinnon osoittamasta kasvulohkosta. Vastauksen perusteella arvioidaan tarve uusintakäynnille.

Mihin Vipu-mobiili pyytää lupaa?

- Sijaintitiedot – Varmistamme, että selvityspyynnön vastaukselle liitetty kuva on otettu hallinnon osoittamalta kasvulohkolta.
- Kameran käyttö – Selvityspyynnön vastaukseen tarvitaan sovelluksella otettu valokuva, jonka ottamista sovellus ohjaa.

Stay updated with the latest information: Access your payslips and receive automatic notifications for incoming new ones. Register receipts and mileage expenses and send them for approval. Easily enter your work hours, register your sick leave or apply for vacation on the go.
 
Visma Employee is a business app for your mobile device. It provides those currently receiving their payslip from various Visma payroll solutions with quick and easy access to their payslips. View your payslip on the go, when and where suits you. The app also contains an integration with Absence & Expense, so you can easily register sickness, send vacation requests and register all the other event types directly from the app. In the Expense section you can easily take photos of your receipts and create mileage expenses, and send them directly for approval.

A streamlined mobile app that allows you to:

• View your payslips
• See the original payslip (PDF), if you wish to view all details
• Export all your payslips to a single PDF
• Register absence and attendance
• Send vacation requests
• Automatically scan receipts and digital images/ PDF documents and register them as expenses
• Register mileage expenses by following the map for automatic distance calculation
• Send expense claims for approval
• Setup automatic notifications for incoming payslips,vacation approval, and more.
• Secure your app with a personalized security code/Touch ID

Supported languages: Norwegian, Swedish, Finnish and English
 
If you are wondering if this app works for you, contact your payroll administrator. Some of the features listed will be enabled based on your role.

With Spacent app you can work from the broadest network of remote working locations in the Nordics. Gain unlimited access to all locations with a single membership, pay only for the spaces you use or ask your employer to provide you the employee benefit of the future. 

Spacent connects excess spaces from co-working operators, universities and other companies with workers in need of flexible workspaces. The application also combines your own office and the network of locations, improving the collaboration of employees and providing data for the employers.  

Booking a desk, a meeting or a project space is easy:

- Download the Spacent App, press “Get started” and follow the instructions
- Select the time and duration for your stay
- Filter spaces based on amenities (such as phone booths or external monitors) or colleagues
- Select a suitable space from the list or map
- Show up and settle in!

M-Files® is a powerful and dynamic enterprise content management (ECM) and document management solution that solves the problems of managing, finding, tracking and securing information in companies of all sizes. 

The M-Files iOS application lets you access your M-Files documents anytime and anywhere – even when you’re on the go or not connected to your office network. The application enables you to find documents from your M-Files Vaults via powerful search functions and various, customizable views, as well as to view and approve documents and workflows.

To be able to utilize the iOS application you need to have an M-Files system set up and to possess the required access rights. To get started, you need an M-Files server address and login credentials.

The M-Files iOS application has been optimized for both the iPhone and the iPad layouts.
